verbose_text: XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR Dexamethasone is an ideal candidate to modify the microenvironment of lesioned joint in order to promote cartilage regeneration as it (a) acts as an anti-inflammatory signal, 20 (b) induces MSC chondrogenic differentiation, XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR (c) stimulates aggrecan gene expression in MSCs, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and (d) maintains collagen type II synthesis in chondrocytes.
